AgentJavaDeclaration
public class JavaDebugger
extends Object
implements AgentJavaDeclaration

JDB driver for Blink debugger.

getFrames

public List<xtc.lang.blink.CallStack.JavaCallFrame> getFrames()
                                                       throws IOException
Let the Blink debugger to talk to the jdb and obtain Java stack frame list. Then, parse the output messages and constuct a list of Java stack frames.

Returns:
The list of java stack frames.
Throws:
IOException
